review: Our experience with Dr. Jitender Dabas was highly satisfactory. His charges for the surgical procedure to remove a saliva gland were reasonable, making quality dental care accessible. Dr. Dabas exhibited expertise and patience in explaining the issue and treatment approach. His clinic is well-equipped with diagnostic tools, ensuring thorough evaluation. Post-procedure, Dr. Dabas provided detailed instructions for care, contributing to a smooth recovery. Additionally, scheduling appointments with Dr. Dabas was hassle-free, further enhancing the overall experience. Overall, Dr. Dabas's professionalism and comprehensive care make him a commendable choice for dental needs.

My teeth could not be corrected through allignment and consulted many doctors but i was not satisfied with their consultation but finally when i came to doctor jitendra dabbas he suggested me tooth implant and it was painless and cost effective too. I would recommend you all jitendra dabbas.
He is such an amazing dentist. I went there for wisdom tooth extraction and he did it with such ease and zero pain. I will highly recommend him for and dental problem.

My upper dental implant (from a different dentist) had gone inside my maxillary sinus. Dr. Dabas performed the surgery to remove it and I am grateful to him.

He is empathetic and listens to patientâ€™s concern. He listened and answered my queries and during the surgery also kept ensuring I am feeling okay.

I would highly recommend Dr. Dabas.
reply_text: Thank you for the words of appreciation.

review: I got my implant done by Dr Jitender. Totally painless procedure, excellent follow up. Neat and clean clinic. Highly recommended.

My wisdom tooth was severely decayed and I was afraid to get it removed. However, to my surprise Dr Dabas removed it painlessly and I am free from the long term pain. Very soft spoken *** ************* *******
I got my full mouth dental implants fixed by Dr Jitender. The procedure was done nicely and I am able to chew properly now. His follow up after procedure is also very good. Highly recommended.
